DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Site Research Personnel Staff Security Role Object Security Role Object Code ResearchStaffRoleCode
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.:People engaged in research.:The employees of an organization; personnel who assist their superior in carrying out an assigned task.:This class defines the security role object in context of an application. The roles are collection of privileges._This class defines the security role object in context of an application. The roles are collection of privileges.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation._An indication of the role assumed by a research staff member on a study.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.:People engaged in research.:The employees of an organization; personnel who assist their superior in carrying out an assigned task.:This class defines the security role object in context of an application. Concepts.definition: A healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.
The employees of an organization; personnel who assist their superior in carrying out an assigned task.
This class defines the security role object in context of an application. The roles are collection of privileges.

Property.preferredDefinition: This class defines the security role object in context of an application. The roles are collection of privileges.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.

Concepts.definition: This class defines the security role object in context of an application. The roles are collection of privileges.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 8/5/12 - Released as part of caAERS v2.0 model cleanup; caAERS v1.0 retired.  jc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An indication of the role assumed by a research staff member on a study.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A designated person who is trained and responsible for coordinating adverse event review, tracking, surveillance and reporting activities within a clinical institution or clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: A designated person who is trained and responsible for coordinating adverse event review, tracking, surveillance and reporting activities within a clinical institution or clinical trial.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A living individual about whom an investigator conducting research obtains data through intervention or interaction with the individual or through identifiable private information.:A person responsible for organizing multiple events or efforts into a smaller number of tasks.

Concepts.definition: A living individual about whom an investigator conducting research obtains data through intervention or interaction with the individual or through identifiable private information.
A person responsible for organizing multiple events or efforts into a smaller number of tasks.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:A person responsible for organizing multiple events or efforts into a smaller number of tasks.

Concepts.definition: A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.
A person responsible for organizing multiple events or efforts into a smaller number of tasks.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who handles most of the administrative responsibilities of a clinical study, acts as liaison between investigative site and sponsor, and reviews all data and records before a monitor's visit.

Concepts.definition: A person who handles most of the administrative responsibilities of a clinical study, acts as liaison between investigative site and sponsor, and reviews all data and records before a monitor's visit.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A report or observation of one or more adverse events that must be submitted within a specified amount of time due to the severity of one or more of the events.:A person with a responsibility for examining something to make sure that it is adequate, accurate, or correct.

Concepts.definition: A report or observation of one or more adverse events that must be submitted within a specified amount of time due to the severity of one or more of the events.
A person with a responsibility for examining something to make sure that it is adequate, accurate, or correct.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The staff member at the organization who is responsible for program management of the study and functions as the primary contact at the organization.

Concepts.definition: The staff member at an organization who is responsible for program management of the study and functions as the primary contact for the organization.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: 02/08/2007 - Updated with NCI Thesaurus definition and saved previous definition as an alternative definition.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
